Object Shape: Circle, Fireball, Oval, Sphere, Triangle, Other, Unknown
divs: Sighting DetailsI watched three glowing red objects gliding below low cloud cover. The first one, which I got a good pic of, was very close, Id say less 200 feet, maybe less. There is low cloud cover tonight, they came in low, and from the north. The next two objects were a little higher up, it is one of those that is in the video, Now, the video IS in HD......What it needs is STILL FRAME ZOOM ANALYSIS.......In the still image I have sent, you can clearly see the shape of the object. They are not actually spheres, that's just how they LOOK...........
Summary: three red glowing objects one after the other in 10 min. span
